products.name: Alcohol-Based Hand Sanitizer
products.description: An alcohol-based hand sanitizer with 70% alcohol content.
products.termsOfUsage: Apply a small amount to hands, rub together until dry.
products.refundPolicy: Refunds accepted within 30 days of purchase.

products.description: A compact-sized hand sanitizer perfect for travel.
products.termsOfUsage: Apply a small amount to hands, rub together until dry.
products.refundPolicy: Refunds accepted within 14 days of purchase.

products.termsOfUsage: Apply a small amount to hands, rub together until dry.
